overview.title: Remarkable aluminum alloy craftsmanship
overview.text: Huawei GR3 meets the modern generation’s demand for every moment to be as active as they are. An elegant frame inlaid in an aluminum alloy unibody, finished with a ceramic-sand-blasting process makes Huawei GR3 a piece of fashionable art, shining in gray, silver, and Gold.

overview.title: Fast is Best
overview.text: With Huawei GR3’s LTE cat4 networking you will never have to slow your pace. With a download speed up to 150Mbps, you can enjoy a smooth flow of data, and the smooth interaction with your world.

overview.title: Capture the Fleeting Moments
overview.text: It’s heartbreaking to watch a perfect moment slip away. With the 13mega-pixel camera featuring the ultra-fast snapshot feature, you will capture these fleeting magic moments in full definition innan instant.

specification.title: CPU
text: MTK MTK6753T, Octa core, 1.5 GHz, Cortex-A53 64bit
